amendment.description: An amendment numbered 72 printed in the Congressional Record to limit the plan that, if leased for oil and gas production, to not increasing net carbon emissions.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to limit the leasing of Federal land for oil and gas production if it would result in an increase in net carbon emissions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ocasio-Cortez amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 228 (Roll no. 68).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A042) offered by Ms. Ocasio-Cortez.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ocasio-Cortez amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 228 (Roll no. 68).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
